org.knime.core.util.crypto

Class KNIMEDecryptionStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • javax.crypto.CipherInputStream
          • org.knime.core.util.crypto.KNIMEDecryptionStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class KNIMEDecryptionStream
extends CipherInputStream
    This stream decrypts data that has been encrypted with the secret KNIME key. Is also offers direct access to the public KNIME key.
    Since:
    2.4
    Author:
    Thorsten Meinl, University of Konstanz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RSAPublicKey DEFAULT_PUBLIC_KEY
      KNIME's public key.

      Constructor and Description
      KNIMEDecryptionStream(InputStream is)
      Creates a new decryption stream using KNIME's public key.
